title: How far does an object travel in first 10 sec

content.description: An object of mass 10 kg starts from rest at time t = 0 and moves in a straight line. For time t > 0, the objectâ€™s velocity v as a function of time t is given by v = 2t + 3t2 , where v is in m/s and t is in seconds.
content.question: How far does the object travel during the first 10 s of its motion?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
